original_text: And after certain years he went down to Ahab to Samaria. And Ahab killed sheep and oxen for him in abundance, and for the people that he had with him, and persuaded him to go up with him to Ramothgilead.
korean_text: 이 년 후에 그가 사마리아의 아합에게 내려갔더니 아합이 그와 시종을 위하여 양과 소를 많이 잡고 함께 가서 길르앗 라못 치기를 권하였더라

sentences.original_text: he went down to Ahab to Samaria.
And Ahab killed sheep and oxen for him in abundance,
sentences.korean_translation: 아합은 그를 위해 풍성하게 양과 소를 잡았고,

sentences.original_text: and for the people that he had with him,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그와 함께 있던 사람들을 위해도,

sentences.original_text: and persuaded him to go up with him to Ramothgilead.
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 설득하여 함께 라못길렛으로 올라가게 했다.
